name: Reddo
blurb: Reddo is a game designed to teach you a language by immersing you in a 3D world in the form of a sandbox RPG.

rewards.reward: Contributor - Your name will be added to the EvoMobius website as a contributor of Reddo.

Beta Tester - You will be given beta access to the project during development to see how the game is progressing. Your name will also be added to the EvoMobius website as a contributor of Reddo.

You will receive a copy of Reddo on all platforms with this package when the game is complete.

Platforms: Web, Mac, Windows, Linux

Stylish Beta Tester - You will be given beta access to the project during development to see how the game is progressing. You will also receive a custom made Reddo polo t-shirt and Your name will be added to the EvoMobius website as a contributor of Reddo.

You will receive a copy of Reddo on all platforms with this package when the game is complete.

Platforms: Web, Mac, Windows, Linux

Another Brick In The Wall - You will be given beta access to the project during development to see how the game is progressing. You will also be allowed to create a customized message of 140 characters that will show on a brick in the game. Your name will also be added to the EvoMobius website as a contributor of Reddo. 

You will receive a copy of Reddo on all platforms with this package when the game is complete.

Platforms: Web, Mac, Windows, Linux
